title: Malaika Arora’s 46th Birthday Bash, Non-bailable Warrant Against Remo D'Souza & More From Ent
text:
1. Malaika Arora Rings In Her 46th Birthday With Close Friends And Family And It Was One Lavish Affair!

Actress Malaika Arora is excited to celebrate her birthday in Mumbai with her friends and family after six years. The Bollywood diva turns 46 on Wednesday. After six years, Malaika chose to ring in her birthday in Mumbai, breaking her favourite tradition of holidaying with friends and family.

2. Non-bailable Warrant Issued Against Choreographer-Director Remo D'Souza In Rs 5 Crore Fraud

The warrant was issued by Ghaziabad court and additional chief judicial magistrate Mahendra Rawat will be served to the choreographer in Mumbai after taking permission from Inspector General of Police, Meerut Zone, deputy superintendent of police Atish Kumar said.

3. People In Lebanon Are Painting Their Faces Like Joaquin Phoenix’s Joker To Protest Against Govt

Don't Miss 1.6 K SHARES 3.9 K SHARES 159 SHARES

According to a report on Wired, a woman reportedly said, “The reason we painted our faces is because we related to the character in the movie. Because before he painted his face he was just living that miserable life. Nobody cared about him, nobody would listen to him. He's upset, he's angry, and it just drove him to madness and that's what's happening [in Lebanon]."

4. Bigg Boss 13: Siddharth Shukla’s Balika Vadhu Co-Star Sheetal Khandal Claims He Used To Touch Her Inappropriately

“Many in the industry are aware of his true colors. I myself have been victim of his sexist behavior when we were working together in Balika Vadhu. He has tried on many girls, you know what I mean," a report on IWMbuzz quoted Sheetal Khandal as saying.

5. Narcos’ Pablo Escobar Wagner Moura To Attend International Film Festival Of India In Goa

The Brazilian actor, who is visiting the country in November for the film gala in Goa, will present his directorial debut Marighella in debut competition category.
description: From Malaika Arora celebrating her 46th birthday in style to non-bailable warrant being issued against Remo D’Souza in frad case to Bigg Boss 13 making headlines yet another day, here is all that rocked the world of Bollywood as well as entertainment today.
